item.title: Exponentially Weighted Moving Averages - Deep Learning
item.description: This article is about EWMA, that focuses on the trends within a dataset by establishing the weights or magnitudes that vary depending on how recent the values are...

item.title: CharacterLevel-RNN-Model-Indian Names Generator
item.description: This is a demonstration of character level - recurrent neural networks. In this project we have trained the newural network with a dataset of Indian names and generated a new set of names....
